title: Ni–CoSe2 heterojunction coated by N-doped carbon for modified separators of high-performance Li–sulfur batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15358-15364
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01660B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kai Wang, Haiqin Yang, Ruiqiang Yan, Cairong Chen, Chenglin Wu, Wei Chen, Zhicai He, Guobo Huang, Ling Chang
A novel Ni–CoSe2 heterojunction coated with N-doped carbon is designed to modify separators of Li–S batteries, exhibiting the synergism of suppressing shuttle effects and accelerating reaction kinetics.
